ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:06:38 [Issue ID 4000-13882] urn:comicvine:4000-13882 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-20 21:02:25. [Issue ID 13882]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Howard the Duck’s first appearance! The Nexus of All Realities has been disturbed, and Jennifer Kale’s dreams portend a dark future. A barbarian named Korrek is launched into our dimension through a jar of peanut butter. You may be laughing now, but you won’t be by the end of this issue!
The demon Thog's plan to collides the realms is confronted by a multi-generational Army led by Korrek, Jennifer Kale, Dakimh, the Man-Thing and their strange new ally... Howard the Duck. After this issue, Man-Thing's adventure are continued in his own Man-Thing Vol.1 ongoing series!
Note: This issue features the very first appearance of the well-known Howard the Duck.
ComicInfo.Title: The Enchanter's Apprentice!
